black_hole.name: Black Hole
black_hole.description: Increases ship velocity but decreases inertia

cataclysmic_variable.name: Cataclysmic Variable
cataclysmic_variable.description: Increases shield transfer and reduces capacitor capacity

magnetar.name: Magnetar
magnetar.description: Increases damage but reduces targeting and tracking

pulsar.name: Pulsar
pulsar.description: Increases shield HP but decreases armor resistances

red_giant.name: Red Giant
red_giant.description: Increases heat damage and overheating benefits

wolf_rayet.name: Wolf-Rayet
wolf_rayet.description: Increases armor HP and small weapon damage, decreases shield resistances
